title: rdsmaster2
author: rdsmaster2
content: BTCROAD TO SUCCESS CHANNELBTCMany of you are tired of scammy crypto signals that always make you lose your deposit, we know that and we are also tired.That is why we are here, we created a telegram channel with free signals where you can try them out, convince yourself that our original signals are genuinely profitable, and of course, we offer paid services for extra daily signals.The VIP service is completely up to you, no one will spam you pushing you into doing something you do not want to do until you are 100% sure, and the free signals are as efficient as the paid ones, the only difference is the number of signals you can receive.Our statistics show that we are able to provide an 81% success rate and daily profitability of a minimum 20%, on the worst days of course.Not only we offer free signals, we also analyze the losses that happen due to the market's fluctuations, we throw actual interesting news about the market, not boring stuff about why XRP is still in a lawsuit, but interesting news affecting the market in real time, we also throw educational videos and articles for you to learn more and many other interesting tips on how to open and close profitable positions. You are not losing anything by joining our channel and seeing the results with your own eyes and if you want to maximize the profits you can make, you are more than welcome to contact our admins for further details about the VIP program.We work only in English but we have translators for some other languages!So don't waste any more time and join our channel, finally, you will find that crypto signals group that won't annoy you but genuinely bring you profits.Link to the channel - https://t.me/roadtosucc3sAdmin's contact - @RDS_Admin1

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: rdsmaster2 on August 24, 2023, 04:25:49 PMMany of you are tired of scammy That is why we are here, we created a telegram channel with free signals where you can try them out, convince yourself that our original signals are genuinely profitable, and of course, we offer paid services for extra daily signals.Then why are you sounding like the them. I mean like this:Quote from: rdsmaster2 on August 24, 2023, 04:25:49 PMMany of you are tired of scammy crypto signals that always make you lose your deposit, we know that and we are also tired.To newbie traders:Without knowledge and experience, a trader can not be successful in trading. Trading signal groups have nothing to offer than to enrich their pockets with your money, they do not care if the trader will lose it win.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: After I had read through the first paragraph coupled with the topic of the thread I did not bother reading any further because you have already passed across your message telling us who you really are. Scammers really do this just as you have done introducing yourself and that speaks of much volume. I would not be surprise if you succeed in getting what you want and at the end your signal community starts complaining of your acts. There have been lots of threads of this nature in the past and similar thing repeating itself in a refurbished and well packaged way to deceive newbie traders to joining their community and when they do that they start requesting for what they can not process but a product of already generated signal from another group. So tell us any difference from yours?

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: How can someone send the signals , you can just influence the market for a short time

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 24, 2023, 04:36:39 PMTo newbie traders:Without knowledge and experience, a trader can not be successful in trading. Trading signal groups have nothing to offer than to enrich their pockets with your money, they do not care if the trader will lose it win.That's a 100% valid assumption because I also believe that those trading signal groups are mostly copy/pasting the signals to many groups only to fill their pockets with money. I know there can be a few valid signal groups but surely they will also have their models to generate income because without any income why should those traders waste their time to share those signals. Most of the signals aren't even shared by good traders because good traders would most probably do trading themselves rather than sharing those signals in groups like that unless they can earn some kind of revenue from such thing. I would recommend @OP to be warned that the members of this forum are not naive enough to join those signal groups because I can smell some kind of scam activity in your offer and that's why I'm warning you to stop promoting such bogus services.
